name: Alek's Controllable Christmas Lights -- Clean up
description: This user style dramatically cleans up the layout on Alek's Controllable Christmas Lights for Celiac Disease.

user.name: scottywz

additional_info:
2014-04-04: Make @font-face declarations specific to komar.org.
2012-12-04: Minor fixes.
2012-12-02: Using Ubuntu font, the page body is now (at maximum) 1,000 pixels wide and centered horizontally, and some other minor visual changes.
2010-12-04: Some minor tweaks.
2010-09-14: Fixed so that it will work after 2008.
